channel.title: Eve
channel.desc: We teach women to love and respect their men again, learn to heal from their past and face the future with a smile.

channel.name: GauTV ZA
channel.title: Apostle Ebenezer Ndlovu

channel.desc: Catch Baby Brown with industry legends as he interviews them about their lives and the industry they are in.

channel.name: GauTV ZA

channel.desc: Catch Professor Mashudu Tshifularu, 'The Ear Doctor', as he unpacks everything that has to do with ENT (ear, nose and throat).

channel.name: GauTV ZA
channel.title: I Design
channel.desc: We focus on educating the viewer about fashion. Upcoming designers are given a platform to showcase their talent and product.
